title.rendered: Aqualis ASA: Presentation of Q2 2015 results

content.rendered:
19 August 2015 – Aqualis ASA will release its second quarter and first half 2015 results on Wednesday 26 August 2015.

A webcast with CEO David Wells and CFO Christian Opsahl presenting the Q2 financial results will be made available from the following Constantly URL that 08:00 CET:

http://webtv.hegnar.no/presentation.php?webcastId=22971706

The quarterly report and the presentation materials will be published on www.newsweb.no and www.aqualisbraemar.com.
